body.name: REDTIGER Muti-Size Hardwire Kit for F9/F17 Mini Dash Cam and T27 Mirror Dash Cam, USB C Power Port, 24-Hour Parking Monitoring with Low Voltage Protection
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 14 mins
features: [ Wide Compatible ] Input:12V-24V; Output:5V/2A. With Type-C ports, this hardwire kit compatible with all of dash cams.
[ EASY TO INSTALL ] With the installation tool, there's no need to use a cable from car cigarette lighter socket, instead it's a permanent hidden cable, and very easy to install.

[ 24 HOURS MONITOR ] 24 Hours Surveillance: The vehicle hard-wire kit connect to car battery or fuse box power, can realize continuous power supply for 24 hours. It can keep powered on even car turned off.

[ LOW VOLTAGE PROTECTING ] Multiple Security Protection - With low voltage protection, REDTIGER hardwire kit will automatically cut off the power after 60s when the voltage is lower than 11.8V（+-0.2). Not applicable to trucks with voltage above 24V. More security protection like over-current, short-circuit, reverse connection, and overheat.
[ WORRY FREE SERVICES ] 1 year free-replacement warranty for quality problems.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The REDTIGER F9/F17 Mini Dash Cam and T27 Mirror Dash Cam Hardwire Kit compatible with F9/F17 Mini Dash Cam and T27 Mirror Dash Cams. -Warm tips: 1. Please make sure the ACC and BAT is connected correctly. 2. Please feel free to reach us if any professional help in need. 3. Please use the dedicated hardwire kit for the REDTIGER F7N/F7NP/F7NS dash cam, Because the other brands of hardwire kits are not available for Redtiger dash cams. 4. The length of this hardwire kit is 11.5ft, various types of vehicles, especially regular passenger cars, sedans, SUVs, and trucks. 5. Therefore, when selecting a voltage hardwire kit, it is recommended to refer to the specifications and requirements of your vehicle and device to ensure compatibility and safety. 6. Note that installation steps may vary by model and situation. It is strongly recommended to refer to the vehicle manual or seek professional help before installation. -Instructions for installation 1. Make sure everything is ready and safe before installation. 2. Locate the car's fuse box. It is usually located under the dashboard on the driver's side or in the engine compartment. 3. Identify the ACC (Accessory) fuse slot in the fuse box. This slot provides power when the ignition is on. Locate the constant power fuse slot in the fuse box. This slot provides power even when the ignition is off. 4. Connect the red wire from the hardwire kit to the ACC fuse slot. Connect the yellow wire from the hardwire kit to the constant power fuse slot. You can use a fuse tap or a fuse adapter to make the connection. 5. Find a suitable grounding point near the fuse box. It should be a metal surface that is securely connected to the vehicle's chassis. 6. Connect the black wire from the hardwire kit to the grounding point using a ring terminal or a suitable grounding connector. 7. Once all the connections are secure, tuck away any excess wires and ensure they are safely routed to avoid interference with the vehicle's controls. 8. Test the hardwire kit by turning on the ignition. The dash cam should receive power and start functioning.

Low Voltage Protection Ensure the safety of your vehicle's battery with the Redtiger Hardwire Kit. It features a low voltage protection mode that cuts off power when the voltage drops below 11.8V(+-0.2). Universal Compatibility The 11.5ft voltage hardwire kit is suitable for various types of vehicles, especially regular passenger cars, sedans, SUVs, and trucks. It is used to convert the 12V/24V power supply in vehicles to a lower voltage for devices that require it. Easy Installation With the hardwire kit, you can hide the wiring and eliminate clutter inside your vehicle. Enjoy a clean and professional-looking installation. Enjoy hassle-free setup and reliable power supply.

G-Sensor Function You can also set Gsensor for the dash cam, when your vehicle suffers from vibration or collision, it will automatically start recording and lock the key video. Preserve critical evidence for insurance claims or legal purposes. 24H Parking Monitoring The Redtiger hardwire kit connected to car fuse box power, can uninterruptedly supply power for dash camera for 12/24/48 hours. It can even supply power when the car is turned off. Protect your vehicle and capture any potential incidents that may occur. Multiple Fuse Models The Redtiger Dash Cam Hardwire Kit offers four different fuse models to cater to various vehicle types. Choose the right fuse for your car model and enjoy a seamless installation.

The B+ (yellow) The yellow cable should be connected to the fuse of the constant power supply in the car fuse box. If you are looking for a constant power supply in the fuse box: Use a voltage tester to check the fuse to ensure it still have electricity even if the car engine is off. The ACC (red) Identify the ACC (Accessory) fuse slot in the fuse box. This slot provides power when the ignition is on. Testing method : The tester bulb will light when the engine if on and won't light when the engine is off. The Ground (black) This black cable is connected to the metal parts of the vehicle. There are screw nails and metal parts near the fuse boxes in many cars. Connect the black cable to the screw or metal part.

reviews.reviewText: Pretty easy to install once you installed the cigarette port cable before. More than enough length to run from camera to your fuse box. Doesn't feel cheap either. Would recommend!

reviews.reviewText: We put one in each our vehicles so that we can switch between the two

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars hardwaire kit for F9 RedTiger dashcam
reviews.reviewText: Parking mode does not work.Parking mode does not work on F9 Camera.SUV is Expedition Max 2018. Fuse box is on passenger side. Connections are made correctly. Red (ACC) cable is connected to fuse which has power only when car is started. Yellow (B) is connected to fuse which always have power. Ground is glued to metal body. 5 Amp fuse are used for both connections.Camera starts and records normally when SUV is started. Camera shuts down when car is switched off/engine stopped.1. There is no option in the Android app to enable/disable parking mode.2. Connections have been checked multiple times, they are as described in the manual.I think you should make your android app better. Give more control of camera.Please respond to me how to enable parking mode. That is the reason i bought hardware kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works even better with the correct cable
reviews.reviewText: Couldn't figure out how to keep the camera Screen on using the connection that came with the camera. I noticed that the cable had a third connection for Ignition. Now everything works like I want it and it opened up the cigarette plug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Redtiger is great
reviews.reviewText: I called about a bad hardware kit and I had a new hardware kit within a few days. Great service policy and service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My hardwire kit was manufactured wrong. The yelllow wire is supposed to be the "Hot" wire and the red the Accessory wire (ignition on), but these wires were switched on mine. I had to hook it up with the red wire as the "hot wire" and the yellow as the accessory wire. It wasn't hard to change, but I spent quite a bit of time trying to figure out what was wrong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Simply put it the parking mode doesn't work with my camera. Yes I wired it properly but it appears to be a wrong product for my camera model. Why there is even a need to have different USB-C kits for one camera manufacturer?Edit:Seller contacted me and explained why there are different hardware kits and fully refunded the cost of an incompatible hardware kit as well as a partial refund for a dashcam itself. Just based on that I'd say the seller was a pleasure to deal with and stands behind their product and fully committed to make customers happy, 5 stars from me. Dashcam itself works perfect and produces great videos, would buy from this seller again in a heartbeat. Just watch folks and don't repeat my mistake, order a proper kit for the dashcam you're buying.

Installato il cablaggio sulla Skoda Fabia 2019 posizione accendi sigari corrente continua e uscite usb ricarica telefono con corrente alternata il sistema parcheggio funziona alla grande , riguardo al venditore super cordiale e disponibile per qualsiasi problema dovrebbero essere tutti così farò altri acquisti con loro

Die Bilder zeigen den Belegungsplan und das angeschlossene Kabel-Kit im Sicherungskasten unterhalb des Armaturenbrett eine KIA VENGA, Bj 2017. Nach vorerst vergeblichen Versuchen das Kabel-Kit anzuschließen brachten mir ein paar Stunden Abstand von der Angelegenheit die "Erleuchtung" . Nicht alle Metallteile und Schrauben sind mit Masse (-) verbunden. Das war auch der Grund dafür, anzunehmen, daß das Kabel-Kit wohl defekt sei. Aber nach nochmaliger Suche nach einer Masse-führende Stelle/Schraube, funktioniert nun auch das Kabel-Kit so, wie zu erwarten sein sollte. Die einzelnen Adern (sieheSicherungskasten) sind zwar etwas zu dünn, aber der Rest, der innen entlang der Karosserie verlegt werden muß, ist ausreichend stabil, und für diese Arbeiten sehr gut geeignet. Kamera zeigt glasklare Bilder über die Front, aber auch die rückwärtige Kamera bringt sehr gute Bilder.Durch die Verwendung des Kabel-Kit ist nun auch die Option der "Rundumüberwachung" beim Parken sichergestellt.Danke REDTIGER-EUR. Danke für die zwei tollen Produkte. Gern weiter so, gern mal wieder!UNBEDINGT EMPFEHLENSWERT.!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Smaller than expected, which was a nice surprise and still a good quality
reviews.reviewText: I spent so much time looking for the best hardwire kit only to find out accidentally that RedTiger provides these as well. It’s logical that if the price is right, you can’t go wrong with getting a full setup from the same company. As the RedTiger cameras have been serving me for years I was confident in my choice.For all people installing hardwire kit for the first time. Yes, it might be confusing at first but after being quoted almost £200 for 5 minutes job (from professional perspective) I decided to do it myself. To be honest the kit comes with the plastic wedge and installation quide which is quite clear and self explanatory.Going back to the kit itself, the product is very nice and feels reliable. The length of the cables is standard/sufficient to go inside the cabin from the fuse box around the front window. Also it already comes with car fuses, so if you know what you are doing then you can’t go wrong with it. In my situation I simply went to Halfords and purchased extra 2x 10A fuses (this was specific for my car, but it may not be for yours) just in case. After I figured out which fuses are ACC (power only when engine is on) and which one are BATTERY (constant power), things got simple (it is important to understand which side is + and which one is -).Going back to the main subject, the installation went smoothly and the setup has been operational for days without a hiccup. Also stay reassured that the device has low voltage protection, so it won’t drain your battery flat. If that doesn’t convince you, then I don’t know what.Highly recommended.PS: In case of any problems, you can always message their support. They are not available 24/7 but they always respond.
Bon produit bien adapté à la caméra il fait bien son travail pour gérer l'alimentation.
